REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED

$ ssh 45.127.97.64 @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @ WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED! @ @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ IT IS POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY! Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)! It is also possible that a host key has just been changed. The fingerprint for the RSA key sent by the remote host is SHA256:9lxVjf0Tk3qXvmW0UQ9E7cSFN0ITpVzH8RZhT1UAR1M...

iOS 泛型（Lightweight Generice）的使用

Lightweight Generics 轻量级泛型，纯编译器的语法支持，不借助任何objc runtime的升级。即，完全向下兼容（兼容更低的iOS版本）。

Memcache简单介绍

最近在学习有关缓存的一些知识，了解到有Memcache和Redis，那我先来介绍一下我目前了解到Memcache吧。有些人可能会在网上看到Memcache和Memcached这两个词，这两个个东西其实不必太在意，只不过Memcache是这个项目的名称，而Memcached是项目的服务端主程序名称。

The Murmur Theme

Landing somewhere between a scholarly publication and an adventurers notebook, the Murmur theme presents your words & photographs in a handsome, agreeable manner. It is well behaved on both mobile & desktop and radically minimal in its footprint. Charged and ready for deployment to Github Pages.
